## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by extensions.

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio cache/options
.vs/

# Build results
bin/
obj/

# NuGet packages
packages/
*.nupkg
!packages/*.config  # Keep NuGet restore config

# DLLs, PDBs, and other binaries
*.dll
*.pdb
*.exe
*.xml

# Logs
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.cache

# Publish output
*.PublishSettings
publish/
App_Data/

# Resharper / Rider
_ReSharper*/
*.resharper

# TFS
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# Other generated files
ILLink/
roslyn/

# Ignore Git ignore file backup
.gitignore.txt
